short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get subtitles/captions for any video/audio being played.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Displays subtitles for system/app/tab's audio on active tab. Uses Deepgram's transcription service.

For more information :-
https://github.com/gajananpp/captioner
